title: Space Synth Ambience Pack
description: A unique synth ambient assets solution for any future or space themed games and sci-fi projects.
longDescription:
TAO & SOUND CUSTOM AUDIO SERVICES www.taoandsound.com


Ambience demos playlist


Space Synth Ambience Pack is a unique synth ambient assets solution for any future or space themed games and sci-fi projects with 14 high quality ambient loops perfectly suitable for different kind of situations like adventure, exploration, tense moments, etc.


With 41 additional layers, (2-3 for each main track) designed to create dynamic ambience, offering endless immersion and life to your projects. Give your game that space synth touch as the old school sci-fi movies that you’re looking for.


This pack includes:

• (14) high quality original ambience loops designed for common sci-fi situations.

• (41) layers (2-3 for each main track) to create dynamic ambience by mixing and synchronizing them in your projects.


These sound files are loopable (seamless).


Questions? Please write us at contact@taoandsound.com , and we'll get back to you right away!
